snippet: A former council member from the city of Bell, Calif., was sentenced Friday to one year in jail and five years of probation for inflating his salary by sitting on fake boards.
abstract: George Mirabal, former city council member from Bell, Calif, is sentenced to one year in jail and five years probation for inflating his salary by sitting on fake boards; he is first of five accused council members to be sentenced.
lead_paragraph: A former council member from the city of Bell, Calif., was sentenced Friday to one year in jail and five years of probation for inflating his salary by sitting on fake boards.

headline.main: California: Ex-Official Gets Jail Term in Bell Scandal
headline.print_headline: California: Ex-Official Gets Jail Term in Bell Scandal
